metadata.title: Arcane Abilities
metadata.description: Supernatural abilities related to magic and the supernatural

abilities.name: Concentration
abilities.description: Maintaining focus on spells and resisting distractions during magical activities.

abilities.name: Enigmatic Wisdom
abilities.description: Understanding hidden meanings, symbols, and mystical connections in reality.
abilities.advancement: Study (mystical texts), Training (from Criamon magi), Practice (contemplation)

abilities.name: Faerie Lore
abilities.description: Knowledge of faeries, their customs, powers, and the Faerie realm.
uses: Knowing how to bargain with faeries safely
abilities.advancement: Study (faerie lore texts), Training (from those experienced with faeries), Exposure (faerie encounters)

abilities.name: Finesse
abilities.description: Precise control over magical effects and spells requiring delicate manipulation.
abilities.advancement: Practice (precise spellcasting), Training (from skilled magi), Study (magical control techniques)

abilities.name: Folk Ken
abilities.description: Understanding supernatural creatures and their motivations.
uses: Reading the intentions of supernatural beings
Knowing appropriate protocols for supernatural encounters
abilities.advancement: Practice (supernatural encounters), Training (from experienced individuals), Exposure (supernatural environments)

abilities.name: Infernal Lore
abilities.description: Knowledge of demons, Hell, and infernal powers.
abilities.advancement: Study (forbidden texts), Training (from those who have encountered demons), Exposure (infernal encounters)
abilities.notes: Dangerous knowledge that may corrupt the soul

abilities.name: Magic Lore
abilities.description: General knowledge about magic, magical creatures, and supernatural phenomena.
uses: Identifying magical creatures and their abilities
Recognizing magical items and their properties
abilities.advancement: Study (magical texts), Training (from magical practitioners), Exposure (magical environments)

abilities.name: Magic Theory
abilities.description: Understanding the principles and theory behind Hermetic magic.
uses: Designing new spells in the laboratory
abilities.advancement: Study (magical theory texts), Training (from skilled magi), Practice (laboratory work)
abilities.notes: Essential for all serious magical research and advancement

abilities.name: Parma Magica
abilities.description: The signature defensive magic of the Order of Hermes.
abilities.advancement: Training (from Hermetic magi), Practice (using Parma Magica), Study (advanced techniques)
abilities.notes: Secret of the Order - teaching to non-Hermetics is forbidden

abilities.name: Penetration
abilities.description: Forcing magic through magical resistance and supernatural defenses.
uses: Penetrating Parma Magica and other magical defenses
Affecting targets with natural magic resistance
Using sympathetic connections to boost penetration
abilities.advancement: Practice (casting against resistance), Training (from combat magi), Study (penetration techniques)

abilities.name: Second Sight
abilities.description: The supernatural ability to see through illusions and perceive the invisible.
abilities.advancement: Practice (using Second Sight), Training (from those with the gift), Exposure (supernatural encounters)
abilities.notes: Supernatural ability - requires the Second Sight Virtue

abilities.name: Sense Holiness and Unholiness
abilities.description: Detecting the presence of divine and infernal auras and influences.
uses: Sensing the presence of angels or demons
abilities.advancement: Practice (using the ability), Training (from clergy), Exposure (divine/infernal encounters)
